This is a ripped version in .html with .jpg pictures, therefore it takes up a lot less space...
I really don't understand people claiming that this ain't "the real thing" when they didn't even bother downloading it and seeing for themselves. It IS Brian's alliance leveling guide, and it has NO viruses/spyware/whatsoever in it.
On a side note, if I wanted to spread viruses, why would I choose such an unpopular file which only WoW players know of?
